p:
The CanESM2 LEs with individual forcings provide further insights into the causes of atmospheric temperature changes in the CanESM2 ALL simulation. The OZONE, AERO, SV, and GHG LEs confirm the dominant roles of ozone depletion in lower stratospheric cooling and of well-mixed GHG increases in tropospheric warming (
SI Appendix and
SI Appendix, Figs. S1 and S2).
